text: eninum (ippolutu) nam'mitamiruntu cattiya(markka)m avarkalitam vanta potu, "musavukkuk kotukkappattatu ponru ivarukku en kotukkappatavillai" enru ketkirarkal; itarku munnar, musavukkuk kotukkappattataiyum avar(kalin mutataiyar)kal nirakarikka villaiya? Innum avarkal kurukirarkal; (tiruk kur'anum, tavrattum)"onraiyonru urutippatuttum irantu cuniya(mantira)nkale!" Enru innum avarkal kurukirarkal; "niccayamaka nankal (ivai) anaittaiyum nirakarikkirom" enru
